parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns name of unit's primary weapon (empty string if none).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''primaryWeapon''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_pWeap = [[primaryWeapon]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[primaryWeapon]] [[player]]; //"arifle_MX_ACO_pointer_F"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[primaryWeaponMagazine]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[addPrimaryWeaponItem]], [[removePrimaryWeaponItem]], [[removeAllPrimaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeapon]], [[handgunWeapon]], [[currentWeapon]], [[weapons]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 4, 2006 - 10:57</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Hardrock|hardrock]]<dd class="note">'''primaryWeapon''' tells you what weapon the unit has irrespective of the status of the weapon. For example a unit that has an M16 on his back will still report an M16 as its primary weapon.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|PRIMARYWEAPON]]
